trans-unit.source: Represents a control that has an intrinsic value that does not span a range and can be represented as a string.
trans-unit.target: Representa um controle que possui um valor intrínseco que abrangem um intervalo e pode ser representado como uma cadeia de caracteres.

trans-unit.source: This string may or may not be editable depending on the control and its settings.
trans-unit.target: Essa cadeia de caracteres pode ou não poderão ser editada dependendo do controle e suas configurações.

trans-unit.source: Gets the cached [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property values for this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.ValuePattern"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o cache [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] valores de propriedade para este <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.ValuePattern"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Cached property values must have been previously requested using a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest>.
trans-unit.target: Valores de propriedade em cache devem ser anteriormente solicitados usando <xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest>

trans-unit.source: To get the value of a property at the current point in time, get the property by using <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ValuePattern.Current%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter o valor de uma propriedade no ponto atual no tempo, obtenha a propriedade usando <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ValuePattern.Current%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.ValuePattern.Current%2A>

trans-unit.source: For information on the properties available and their use, see <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ValuePattern.ValuePatternInformation>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter informações sobre as propriedades disponíveis e seu uso, consulte <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ValuePattern.ValuePatternInformation>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.ValuePattern.ValuePatternInformation>

trans-unit.source: The cached property values.
trans-unit.target: Os valores de propriedade em cache.

trans-unit.source: The requested property is not in the cache.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade solicitada não está no cache.

trans-unit.source: Gets the current [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property values for this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.ValuePattern"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a atual [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] valores de propriedade para este <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.ValuePattern"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This pattern must be from an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> with an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode> reference in order to get current values.
trans-unit.target: Esse padrão deve ser de um <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>com um <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode>referência para obter os valores atuais.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> was obtained using <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode>, it contains only cached data, and attempting to get the current value of any property raises an exception.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>foi obtida usando <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode>, ele contém somente dados armazenados em cache e tentar obter o valor atual de qualquer propriedade gera uma exceção.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ValuePattern.Cached%2A> to get the cached value of a property that was previously specified using a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest>.
trans-unit.target: Use <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ValuePattern.Cached%2A>para obter o valor armazenado em cache de uma propriedade que foi previamente especificado usando um <xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.ValuePattern.Cached%2A>

trans-unit.source: For information on the properties available and their use, see <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ValuePattern.ValuePatternInformation>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter informações sobre as propriedades disponíveis e seu uso, consulte <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ValuePattern.ValuePatternInformation>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.ValuePattern.ValuePatternInformation>

trans-unit.source: The current property values.
trans-unit.target: Os valores de propriedade atuais.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ValuePattern.ValuePatternInformation.IsReadOnly*> property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ValuePattern.ValuePatternInformation.IsReadOnly*>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.ValuePattern.ValuePatternInformation.IsReadOnly*>

trans-unit.source: This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications.
trans-unit.target: Esse identificador é usado por aplicativos clientes de automação de interface do usuário.

trans-unit.source: UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ValuePatternIdentifiers>.
trans-unit.target: Provedores de automação de interface do usuário devem usar o campo equivalente no <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ValuePatternIdentifiers>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.ValuePatternIdentifiers>

trans-unit.source: A control should have its <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.IsEnabledProperty> set to `true` and its IsReadOnlyProperty set to `false` before a client attempts a call to <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ValuePattern.SetValue%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Um controle deve ter seu <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.IsEnabledProperty>definido como `true` e seu IsReadOnlyProperty definido como `false` antes de um cliente tenta fazer uma chamada para <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ValuePattern.SetValue%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.ValuePattern.SetValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.IsEnabledProperty>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.ValuePattern"></xref> control pattern.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.ValuePattern"> </xref> padrão de controle.

trans-unit.source: This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications.
trans-unit.target: Esse identificador é usado por aplicativos clientes de automação de interface do usuário.

trans-unit.source: UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ValuePatternIdentifiers>.
trans-unit.target: Provedores de automação de interface do usuário devem usar o campo equivalente no <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ValuePatternIdentifiers>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.ValuePatternIdentifiers>

trans-unit.source: The pattern identifier is passed to methods such as <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCurrentPattern%2A> to retrieve the control pattern of interest from the specified <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>.
trans-unit.target: O identificador padrão é passado para métodos como <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCurrentPattern%2A>recuperar o padrão de controle de interesse de <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> especificado</xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCurrentPattern%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Sets the value of the control.
trans-unit.target: Define o valor do controle.

trans-unit.source: Single-line edit controls support programmatic access to their contents through <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ValuePattern>.
trans-unit.target: Controles de edição de linha única oferecem suporte a acesso programático a seu conteúdo por meio de <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ValuePattern>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.ValuePattern>

trans-unit.source: However, multi-line edit controls do not support the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ValuePattern>; instead they provide access to their content through the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern>control pattern.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, os controles de edição de várias linhas não dão suporte a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ValuePattern>; em vez disso, eles oferecem acesso a seu conteúdo por meio de <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern>padrão de controle.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.ValuePattern>

trans-unit.source: Value to set.
trans-unit.target: Valor a ser definido.

trans-unit.source: The UI Automation provider is responsible for converting the value to the appropriate data type.
trans-unit.target: O provedor de automação de interface do usuário é responsável por converter o valor para o tipo de dados apropriado.

trans-unit.source: The control is read-only.
trans-unit.target: O controle é somente leitura.

trans-unit.source: The control is not enabled.
trans-unit.target: O controle não está habilitado.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ValuePattern.ValuePatternInformation.Value*> property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ValuePattern.ValuePatternInformation.Value*>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.ValuePattern.ValuePatternInformation.Value*>

trans-unit.source: This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications.
trans-unit.target: Esse identificador é usado por aplicativos clientes de automação de interface do usuário.

trans-unit.source: UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ValuePatternIdentifiers>.
trans-unit.target: Provedores de automação de interface do usuário devem usar o campo equivalente no <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ValuePatternIdentifiers>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.ValuePatternIdentifiers>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.
